allow:
Bash(benchmarks" error.

Root Cause: JMH expects either no pattern argument (to run all benchmarks)
or a specific regex pattern. The default ".*" pattern was being explicitly
passed, causing no matches.

Solution:
- Removed default ".*" pattern from both Windows and Linux scripts
- When no argument is provided, pass empty/no pattern to JMH (runs all)
- When pattern is provided, pass it directly to JMH for filtering
- Updated user feedback messages to clarify when running ALL vs filtered

Testing: Verified that java -cp ... org.openjdk.jmh.Main -l works without
pattern but fails with ".*" pattern
